text: Anyone know if there's a way to connect Amazon <> HubSpot?
HubSpot is already friends with AWS...
Someone asked me if there was a way to integrate the two --- someone buys on amazon = creates contact record with purchase data
<@U22PKFRU5> I think we can do this by regularly checking the newly created orders on Amazon and then if any record is found then we can use order data to create contact on HubSpot
Thanks! <@UHGRJBLS1> - Do you know if Amazon have an open api / endpoints or webhooks that we can connect into?

Yes <@U22PKFRU5> Amazon has provided their API endpoints to fetch order details and then the order item details. I have already done something similar to what you have asked but with an ecommerce platform - WooCommerce. That was a 1 way sync though. The extension is used to pull new orders created at Amazon at regular interval of times and then accordingly creating deals ( for amz orders ) and contacts records on HubSpot.

To know more about the same, please refer here:
<https://makewebbetter.com/services/HubSpot-amazon-ebay-integration/>
